entry.title: VolkovLabs/business-charts: The Business Charts plugin integrates the powerful Apache ECharts library into Grafana, enabling you to create rich, interactive charts and graphs within your dashboards. Built on pure JavaScript and leveraging zrender for lightweight rendering, Apache ECharts offers a wide range of chart types and statistical tools.
entry.content: The Business Charts plugin integrates the powerful Apache ECharts library into Grafana, enabling you to create rich, interactive charts and graphs within your dashboards. Built on pure JavaScript and leveraging zrender for lightweight rendering, Apache ECharts offers a wide range of chart types and statistical tools.

entry.title: Radiiplus/octane: Octane is a lightweight, modular JavaScript utility library designed to simplify common tasks in web development. It provides tools for DOM manipulation, event handling, state management, storage, animations, and more.
